body.name: Razor (Twisted Devils MC Book 1)
body.description: I kidnapped an angel to keep her safe. I'll kill to make her mine.I’m relentless. Merciless. Vicious.I live by one rule: protect my Twisted Devils MC family at any cost.Then I see her. Samantha. Everything changes.Now I have a new rule: do whatever it takes to make her mine. Forever.She’s irresistible. Innocent. And in a whole lot of danger.We couldn’t be more different – she’s a nurse who heals, I’m a man who kills.But in this world, I take what I want.And I want her.This angel is no pushover.But even when she fights me, her moans tell me she aches to submit.It’s not long before she’s wrapped in my leather.And softening my twisted heart.Then the deadly secrets in her past emerge.Enemies who threaten everything I love.She says she doesn’t want my protection,But I’m not giving her a choice.Because this Devil will go to hell and back to keep his angel safe.'Razor' is book 1 in the new Twisted Devils MC series and is a steamy, enemies to lovers story. Contains violence, dirty-talking bikers, hot romance, no cheating, no cliffhanger, and a HEA. Can be read as a standalone. Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really liked this!
reviews.reviewText: Fast paced, witty and fun humor, but has enough danger to keep me reading. Definitely in my reading "WIN" column!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed this. Interesting, intense, and it made me want to read on and on. Author is good and kept me interested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thank you for sharing these wonderful romance novel series books. Please keep writing more of these wonderful books. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I didn't feel club bonding
reviews.reviewText: I did like the story. what bothered me the most was Stone didn't really show alpha traits and run a tight club. I didn't feel the clubs closeness like I do in other books. It didn't feel like a tight Brotherhood. Overall the book was ok. I would've liked to see Stone talking to Razor more to find out what was going on besides just saying how mad or disappointed he was. It felt like Razor was on his own for the most parrt. Until he pulled Trips in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Book one in the Twisted Devils MC series was excellent. I enjoyed getting to know the characters and watching them interacting with each other. This book had it all, action, drama, humor, romance and MC business. Looking forward to book2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing book filled with believable unforgetable characters.
reviews.reviewText: This was a new author for me. Book 1 and I'm hooked. If you love MC romance books give Zahra Girard a try. You will not be disappointed. Plenty of action, great sex, laughter and love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Since this was a new author I wasn't sure if I would like it so I figured what the hay I would try it as it is one of my favorite genre .well color me surprised it was well written quick to read because it kept you interested in the characters and what was happening next. Can't wait to read the rest of the series and her other works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good read
reviews.reviewText: This is the first book in this series. I thought it was well written. It is a faster paced book. I would recommend this book.

These men are gruely with a touch of a soft spot for certain people. To think an elderly woman was apart of any kind of crime such as Ruby was an understatement. The love grown is what most girls dream of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 1, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The sizzle that is coming g from razor and Sam is phenomenal but like all MC books the twist and turns are spectacular, the heat is overflowing and just how I like it. Can't wait to read the rest

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 30, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I was in a book funk and your name came up. Where have you been it was brilliant and so true to life. The humour is really funny and the poses lol.
